p: Other studies tend to show beneficial effects related to wine consumption on the occurrence of degenerative pathologies, for example, age-related macular degeneration (AMD) [ 14], dementia [ 15, 16, 17, 18], and cancers [ 19, 20]. Subsequently, various studies have been conducted to determine the effect of different preparations enriched with wine polyphenol or polyphenol grape extracts on various pathologies such as cardiovascular [ 21, 22], ocular [ 23], inflammatory and age-related degenerative diseases [ 24, 25], and cancers [ 26, 27] ( Figure 1).
